title: VR-Based Planetary Science Collaborative Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational earth science concepts and components of the solar system
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service teachers and job seekers exploring planetary science education methods applicable in elementary education settings.

learning_goals: Participants collaboratively solve problems by analyzing planetary geological structures and atmospheric characteristics in a VR environment.
Participants systematically record observational data in a Digital Science Journal (DSJ) and provide peer feedback.
Participants design virtual experiments based on planetary formation theories, predict outcomes, and engage in team discussions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
